Package KI305.Fedus.Lab3

Class ClimateControlDevice

java.lang.Object
KI305.Fedus.Lab3.Conditioner
KI305.Fedus.Lab3.ClimateControlDevice
public class ClimateControlDevice extends Conditioner
The ClimateControlDevice class represents a climate control device extending the Conditioner class. It implements temperature and humidity control interfaces and introduces a charge field for power management.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ClimateControlDevice

      public ClimateControlDevice() throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor for the ClimateControlDevice class. Initializes the climate control device with a generated factory name and a full charge. Increments the controller number.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created.

    • ClimateControlDevice

      public ClimateControlDevice(String factoryName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor for the ClimateControlDevice class with a custom factory name. Initializes the climate control device with the specified factory name and a full charge. Increments the controller number.
      Parameters:
      factoryName - the custom factory name for the climate control device.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created.

    • ClimateControlDevice

      public ClimateControlDevice(String factoryName, Conditioner.ConditionColor conditionColor) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor for the ClimateControlDevice class with a custom factory name and condition color. Initializes the climate control device with the specified factory name, condition color, and a full charge. Increments the controller number.
      Parameters:
      factoryName - the custom factory name for the climate control device.
      conditionColor - the color of the climate control device.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created.

  • Method Details

    • checkHumidity

      public double checkHumidity()
      Checks the humidity level, simulating a decrease in charge.
      Returns:
      a random humidity level within the range [-50, 50].

    • checkTemperature

      public double checkTemperature()
      Checks the temperature level, simulating a decrease in charge.
      Returns:
      a random temperature level within the range [0, 100].

    • toCharge

      public void toCharge()
      Charges the climate control device by a small amount if not fully charged.
